item.title: yarn3-hugo Project Template
item.description: yarn3-hugo Project Template I’ve added a new project template to quickly set up a Hugo-based website, like this blog. Key Features The project repository and dependencies are to be managed with modern Yarn (Berry/v2/v3). Yarn Plug ’n’ Play, or PnP has been disabled in favor of using node_modules. PnP is generally preferred for strictness, but node_modules incur less friction. The default configuration does not utilize Yarn Zero-Installs, which are usually enabled by default in new projects.
